title: Title
authQuestion: Are you legally authorized to work in the USA for our Company?
sponsorshipQuestion: Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H-1B visa status, etc.) to work legally for our Company in the USA?
howDidYouHear: How did you hear about this job?
biggestGrowth: What has been your biggest growth win to date?
biggestGrowthPlaceholder:
How did you come up with the idea?
How did you execute it?
What made it successful?
What could you have done differently?
whyDoYouWant: Why do you want to work in the crypto space?
